---
name: TODO List Application
about: Create a TODO list application (Full Stack)
---

## Problem Summary

Create a TODO list application (Full Stack).

## Scope

- Backend API (Maven/Java)
- Simple HTML/JS Frontend

## Deliverables

1. Java REST API for CRUD (GET, POST, DELETE)
2. Integration with a local SQLite database
3. A single-page Frontend (index.html) to interact with the API

## References

- Use `jdbc:sqlite:todo.db`

## Acceptance Criteria

- API must pass SonarLint checks (0 Major issues)
- Frontend must allow adding and deleting tasks without a page refresh

## Related Issues

None
